Node.definition: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ from Teman (תֵּימָנִי) ► friend of Job (אִיֹּוב) who comes to comfort but concludes by arguing with Job
= descendant or inhabitant of Teman (תֵּימָן)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
primarily found in poetic contexts: = human being; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

Node.gloss: to be wise|to have understanding|to be skilled
Node.definition: = state in which humans have the ability to understand things
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God

Node.gloss: to prove to be righteous|to be just|to be in the right|to be innocent
Node.definition: = state or process by which humans and deities are found to conform to an accepted code of behavior

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= possessions accumulated through advantageous transactions, in which part of the income can be kept for oneself as profit
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which humans experience fear
= action by which humans or deities express their disapproval of something with words
= event where a dispute between two parties is settle by a judge
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= to seize an object as a pledge for a loan
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= action by which someone performs an event without any argument, cause, or reason that could possibly explain or justify it
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= state in which humans are either without clothes or insufficiently dressed; ≈ often associated with poverty or shame
= action by which a human being takes off one or more pieces of someone else's clothing
= condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
literally: arm; hence: = the ability to exert strength

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to respect|to look upon or treat with favor|to honor
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone's) face; hence: = action by which humans or deities show favor or respect to someone, ◄ as if by allowing someone who is looking down out of shame or humility to look up directly into one's face
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

Node.gloss: to send away|to divorce|to expel|to remove|to cast out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities force (other) humans to go away from a certain location and/or position; ◄ due to a lack of affection, as punishment, or for other reasons
literally: arm; hence: = the ability to exert strength

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor
= causative action by which an object is deformed or pulverized by exerting heavy pressure on it
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

= action by which humans, divine beings, or certain events cause (other) humans to experience a state of great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such as trembling and pain
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which something is located high up in the air and out of human reach; ≈ sometimes used as a metaphor to describe things that are beyond human understanding

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed

= celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war

Node.gloss: to be high|to become high|to mount up
Node.definition: = process by which objects reach a relatively high elevation above the earth

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds
= state in which people, animals, or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= dome shaped structure; used exclusively to denote the firmament, which separates the waters above the earth from the earth itself; ≈ God is said to have his dwelling place above this structure; it is also regarded as the boundary between light and darkness

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to tread|to set foot (on something)|to march|to move
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn
= human beings, regardless of sex and age
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to seize|to snatch away|to cause to wrinkle|to cause to shrivel up|to cause to dry up
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities take hold of humans ► in order to harm them|= causative action by which deities cause the skin of humans to shrivel or dry up ◄ as a result of a bad health
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= flowing body of water
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = process by which a construction slowly falls apart, ◄ as if washed away by a river
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= state in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments
only used in poetry; = action by which humans or deities express their disdain of others with words, sounds and/or gestures
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement
= causitive action or process by which humans or deities forcibly terminate the existence of an individual or group of people
= person who intends to harm someone else
literally: what remains, or is left over; hence: = possessions that one has in surplus over the possession one needs in order to live
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

Node.gloss: to take to heart|to be concerned about
Node.definition: literally: to put in/to/on (one's) heart; hence: = to process information in one's mind, often with the intention to act upon it later
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
poetic term for gold (זָהָב)
= hard stony material ◄ that forms the crust of the earth, sometimes exposed on the surface, sometimes hidding under the soil; ≈ associated with hardness, permanence, and security
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= region; ◄ probably in southern Arabia; ► known for its gold
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God
poetic term for gold (זָהָב)
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= referent pointing to a specific condition or circumstance
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God
literally: to lift up (one's) face or head); hence: = action by which humans look up without shame
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans ask a deity earnestly to do something
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= action by which humans in a position of authority end a period of consideration and come to a resolution in their minds
= words spoken by humans and deities
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= process by which an object gives out or reflects a bright light

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= marker indicating that the state that follows does not apply
= state in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments
= state in which something is free of dirt or things that are regarded as pollutants; ≈ often used figuratively to describe being free of guilt

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible
